snippet: Kenseth, a three-time winner at Bristol Motor Speedway, won the pole for Sunday’s Food City 500 in Bristol, Tenn.
abstract: Matt Kenseth wins pole for Food City 500 at Bristol Motor Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Kenseth, a three-time winner at Bristol Motor Speedway, won the pole for Sunday’s Food City 500 in Bristol, Tenn.

headline.main: Matt Kenseth Wins Food City 500 Pole
